1. tsclient - Terminal Server Client supporting XDMCP, VNC and RDP

1.1. VNC

让tsclient支持vnc协议

sudo apt-get install xtightvncviewer

1.2. xdmcp

让tsclient支持xdmcp协议

sudo apt-get install xnest
